places.name: Put Putts Bar
places.notes: A typical west-side bar with a relaxed atmosphere and great staff. Two patios (covered and open air) and solid food.
places.parking: Small parking lot, but it's very close to the bus stop for the laker line.
places.address: 1148 Fulton St W, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

events.description: General trivia night. Team size is generally under 6 people.

places.name: Monarchs Corner Bar
places.notes: A popular live music venue with a bar. They host a variety of events and concerts.
places.parking: Small parking lot available, but street parking is also an option.
places.address: 646 Stocking Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

events.description: A smaller open mic to a bar of good folks. Very cramped - but a great time. Singer songwriter style of open mic, but all are welcome.

places.name: The Pyramid Scheme
places.notes: A live music venue and bar with several pinball machines. They have a variety of events and concerts.
places.parking: Street parking available, but it's best to walk if you're downtown.
places.address: 68 Commerce Ave SW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503

places.name: House Rules
places.notes: A bar with a relaxed atmosphere, known for its board games and trivia nights. They have a good selection of beers and cocktails.The park across the street is a bit sketchy, but not dangerous.
places.address: 404 Ionia Ave SW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503

places.name: One Burbon
places.notes: A typical bar with a great selection of bourbons and whiskeys. Probably the best selection in the city and fairly affordable for the quality.
places.address: 608 Bridge St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Drip Drop Cocktail Room
places.notes: A small coctail bar, known for its unique drinks. It can fill up quickly - or be empty, depending on the night.
places.address: 445 Bridge St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Mulligan's Pub
places.notes: The kind of bar where your feet stick to the floor. Cheap PBR and decent selection of bottles/cans. Filled with regulars who know each other, this place is . Monday is Trivia night which 'is vulgar and not for the faint of heart', but great fun if you can handle some crude humor.
places.address: 1518 Wealthy St SE, Grand Rapids, MI 49506

events.description: Vulgar and not for the faint of heart, but great fun if you can handle some crude humor.

places.name: Fulton Street Pub
places.notes: A bar with lots of open space and a nice patio. They have a decent selection of bottled beers and a few taps - but the food is the real draw.
places.address: 801 Fulton St W, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

events.description: Clean trivia night with a good atmosphere. Very competititve, teams of 1-6 people. Prizes for the top 2 teams and a consolation prize for a team not in the running in the final question.

places.name: Turnsiles
places.notes: Music themed bar with amazing food and live music most nights. Highly recommend the loaded fries.
places.address: 526 Stocking Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

events.description: A great open mic for singer-songwriters.
A great open mic for singer-songwriters and bands.
How well do you know that tune? Music Bingo is a fun twist where they play the song and you mark it off on a bingo card. This one's easy to play, but hard to beat me at.

places.name: Logan's Alley
places.notes: A bar with great food, darts, and chill vibe. Right across the street from a great Coney Island resturant.
places.parking: Very small parking lot, street parking available.
places.address: 616 Michigan St NE, Grand Rapids, MI 49503

places.name: Joey's Tavern
places.notes: A bar with a relaxed atmosphere, known for its board games and trivia nights. They have a good selection of beers and cocktails.
places.address: 1125 Fulton St W, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Broadway Bar
places.notes: A tiny bar with only a few seats. The big draw is that it is christmas themed - like, over the top. It's an experience.
places.address: 740 Broadway Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Social Misfits
places.notes: A cocktail bar that does elevated cocktails and WAFFLES. Yes, waffles.
places.address: 143 Fulton St W, Grand Rapids, MI 49503
